Sentencas: CeO2-based hybrid materials represent a unique class of functional composites with various applications in catalysis, sensors, solid oxide fuel cells, solar cells, and mechanical polishing.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of sesame ball-like CeO2:Y3+/P(St-AA) composite microspheres based on electrostatic interaction

Sentencas: In this work, based on electrostatic interaction between carboxylic groups and rare earth cations, a facile and feasible approach to fabricate sesame ball-like CeO2:Y3+ /P(St-AA) composite microspheres with excellent stability was established.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of sesame ball-like CeO2:Y3+/P(St-AA) composite microspheres based on electrostatic interaction

Sentencas: Carboxylic functionalized mondisperse P(St-AA) microspheres were prepared by soap-free emulsion polymerization and then by composition with positively charged CeO2:Y3+ nanoparticles (NPs) at ambient temperature.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of sesame ball-like CeO2:Y3+/P(St-AA) composite microspheres based on electrostatic interaction

Sentencas: The morphology of as-prepared samples was observed by SEM, TEM, and HAADF-STEM characterizations, and XRD, FIAR, zeta-potential, EDS, DLS and conductometric titration were also used to investigate the structure and formation mechanism of the composite microspheres.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of sesame ball-like CeO2:Y3+/P(St-AA) composite microspheres based on electrostatic interaction

Sentencas: With the advantages of tunable functional groups and loaded ions on the surface of P(St-AA) microspheres and CeO2:Y3+ NPs, respectively, this method could be further expanded for the preparation of various oxide/polymer hybrid composite microspheres.
Titulo: Fabrication and characterization of sesame ball-like CeO2:Y3+/P(St-AA) composite microspheres based on electrostatic interaction
Fabrication and characterization of sesame ball-like CeO2:Y3+/P(St-AA) composite microspheres based on electrostatic interaction
